data.message: I want to discuss some problem which I face during using facebook ?

replies.message: Hey Ilyas. This is a great place to ask a question. How can we help you today? -Jordan

Thanks Facebook for quick reply, the problem is that this is my Official Page on Facebook which is run by me https://www.facebook.com/ilyasqadriziaee the problem is that many people make fake pages by using my name which is illegal so I want to verify this page I submit verify form many time but I can't get any positive response.
You can check my other official accounts also https://twitter.com/ilyasqadriziaee, https://www.instagram.com/ilyasqadriziaee/ & I am also a religious personality on Madani Channel which is broadcasting in pakistan & many more countries 
web streaming : http://www.dawateislami.net/islam/streaming/watch-live-madani-channel.htm
